title: Op-ed: Is Tether’s profitability a risky bet on treasury profits?
description:
Tether, the issuer of the world’s largest stablecoin, USDT, is breaking all records in 2023. In its Q1 assurance report, Tether gained an all-time high reserve surplus of $2.44 billion, and a net profit of $1.48 billion This raised many eyebrows because the world’s largest asset manager, BlackRock, had only $1.2 billion net income in […]

The post Op-ed: Is Tether’s profitability a risky bet on treasury profits? appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Are crypto addicts a thing? A close look
description: Cryptocurrency, with its digital sheen of high-tech allure, has captivated countless individuals.
